alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 3:50PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lake and southwestern Flathead Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 350 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles southwest of Kalispell, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible and low visibility due to heavy rainfall. Locations impacted include... Lake Mary Ronan and Niarada. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region
